segments.text: I want to offer you more invoking stock options .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you hired me , you knew you were going to be low on cash , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me explain . To get more cash , I'll have to borrow more from Vital , the venture capitalists .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know how it works . You don't want to give away any more of your future profits than you have to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . Instead of increasing their position , I want to increase yours .
segments.speaker: S1
